name: enable_lending
attributes: # [doc = " NFT を貸し出し可能にする（署名者チェックを敢えて省略）"]
body: let record = & mut ctx . accounts . lending_record ;
record . borrower = ctx . accounts . borrower . key () ;

name: disable_lending
attributes: # [doc = " NFT の貸し出しを終了する（署名者チェックを敢えて省略）"]
body: let record = & mut ctx . accounts . lending_record ;

fields.name: lending_record
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"lend" , record . owner . as_ref () , record . nft_mint . as_ref ()] , bump = lending_record . bump , has_one = owner @ ErrorCode :: Unauthorized)]

fields.name: borrower
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来は borrower.is_signer チェックが必要だが省略"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: lending_record
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"lend" , record . owner . as_ref () , record . nft_mint . as_ref ()] , bump = lending_record . bump , has_one = owner @ ErrorCode :: Unauthorized)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来は owner.is_signer チェックが必要だが省略"] # [account (mut)]
